sections.heading: Technique: Keep Beats Clean
sections.body:
Rules:
1) **One idea per beat** (no run-ons). 
2) **Stake early** (why it matters). 
3) **Number attempts** if more than one. 
4) **Return to neutral** after RS. 
5) Use classifiers sparingly to support, not distract.

sections.heading: Partner Drill: PAR x2
sections.body: A tells **two** PAR minis (one with 1 attempt, one with 2 attempts). B identifies **stake**, **attempt count**, and **result**. Swap roles.
